entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023
